fileApi.permissionDenied: Permission denied or folder not set. Please reselect the folder.

note.title: Note Preferences
note.encrypted: This note is encrypted. Click the lock icon to decrypt

setNotePassword.title: Set Encryption Password
setNotePassword.description: Set a password to encrypt this note. You'll need this password to view or edit the note in the future.

enterNotePassword.title: Enter Password
enterNotePassword.description: This note is encrypted. Enter the password to view its contents.

appearance.fontSizeDescription: Adjust the font size used throughout the application

language.title: Language

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.downloadDescription: You can download a copy of all your data that we have stored in our systems.
dataManagement.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete your data and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
